languages.text: "Ваша Светлость! Какая честь!" {n}Урбенд возникает из толпы так внезапно, словно с самого начала стоял перед вами.{/n} "Мне жаль, что причиной для визита Вольного Торговца в столицу стали столь прискорбные события".

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость! Вы прибыли!" {n}Урбенд возникает из толпы так внезапно, словно стоял перед вами с самого начала. Он кланяется низко и немного дольше, чем необходимо.{/n}
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! 'Tis an honour!" {n}Governor Urbend Drivestem seems to materialise out of thin air, so suddenly does he emerge from the crowd.{/n} "I regret that such unfortunate circumstances have occasioned the Rogue Trader's visit to the capital."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость! Какая честь!" {n}Урбенд возникает из толпы так внезапно, словно с самого начала стоял перед вами.{/n} "Мне жаль, что причиной для визита Вольного Торговца в столицу стали столь прискорбные события".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! What an honour!" {n}Urbend appears from the crowd so suddenly, as if he had been standing in front of you this entire time.{/n} "I am sorry that such unfortunate circumstances were the reason for the Rogue Trader to visit the capital."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! What an honour!" {n}Urbend appears from the crowd so suddenly, as if he had been standing in front of you this entire time.{/n} "I am sorry that such unfortunate circumstances were the reason for the Rogue Trader to visit the capital."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! What an honour!" {n}Urbend emerges from the crowd so suddenly, as if he had been standing in front of you this entire time.{/n} "I am sorry that such unfortunate circumstances were the reason for the Rogue Trader to visit the capital."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! What an honour!" {n}Urbend emerges from the crowd so suddenly, as if he had been standing in front of you this entire time.{/n} "I am sorry that such unfortunate circumstances were the reason for the Rogue Trader to visit the capital."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! 'Tis an honour!" {n}Governor Urbend Drivestem seems to materialise out of thin air, so suddenly does he emerge from the crowd.{/n} "I regret that such unfortunate circumstances have occasioned the Rogue Trader's visit to the capital."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! 'Tis an honour!" {n}Governor Urbend Drivestem seems to materialise out of thin air, so suddenly does he emerge from the crowd.{/n} "I regret that such unfortunate circumstances have occasioned the Rogue Trader's visit to the capital."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: 「陛下、お目にかかれて光栄です！」{n}アーベント・ドライブステム総督は、宙空より突然具現化したかのように、忽然と姿を表した。{/n}「このような不幸な状況下で、自由開拓者が首都を訪れたことを残念に思います」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! 'Tis an honour!" {n}Governor Urbend Drivestem seems to materialise out of thin air, so suddenly does he emerge from the crowd.{/n} "I regret that such unfortunate circumstances have occasioned the Rogue Trader's visit to the capital."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、お目にかかれて光栄です！」{n}アーベント・ドライブステム総督は、宙空より突然具現化したかのように、忽然と姿を表した。{/n}「このような不幸な状況下で、自由開拓者が首都を訪れたことを残念に思います」
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: “大人！能见到您真是我的荣幸！”{n}厄本·德莱夫斯塔总督突然从人群之中窜了出来，仿佛凭空出现一样。{/n}“行商浪人不得不在这种情况下抵达首都，我对此感到无比遗憾。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! 'Tis an honour!" {n}Governor Urbend Drivestem seems to materialise out of thin air, so suddenly does he emerge from the crowd.{/n} "I regret that such unfortunate circumstances have occasioned the Rogue Trader's visit to the capital."

traits.locale_text: “大人！能见到您真是我的荣幸！”{n}厄本·德莱夫斯塔总督突然从人群之中窜了出来，仿佛凭空出现一样。{/n}“行商浪人不得不在这种情况下抵达首都，我对此感到无比遗憾。”
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie ! C'est un honneur que de vous recevoir ! » {n}Le gouverneur Urbend Drivestem émerge subitement de la foule comme par magie.{/n} « Je suis néanmoins navré que les circonstances de votre visite à la capitale soient si funestes. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! 'Tis an honour!" {n}Governor Urbend Drivestem seems to materialise out of thin air, so suddenly does he emerge from the crowd.{/n} "I regret that such unfortunate circumstances have occasioned the Rogue Trader's visit to the capital."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie ! C'est un honneur que de vous recevoir ! » {n}Le gouverneur Urbend Drivestem émerge subitement de la foule comme par magie.{/n} « Je suis néanmoins navré que les circonstances de votre visite à la capitale soient si funestes. »
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡Es un honor!». {n}El gobernador Urbend Drivestem parece surgir de la nada, atravesando el gentío como si no estuviera.{/n} «Lamento las circunstancias que ocasionan su visita a la capital, Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! 'Tis an honour!" {n}Governor Urbend Drivestem seems to materialise out of thin air, so suddenly does he emerge from the crowd.{/n} "I regret that such unfortunate circumstances have occasioned the Rogue Trader's visit to the capital."

traits.locale_text: «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡Es un honor!». {n}El gobernador Urbend Drivestem parece surgir de la nada, atravesando el gentío como si no estuviera.{/n} «Lamento las circunstancias que ocasionan su visita a la capital, Comerciante Independiente».
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Was für eine Ehre!" {n}Gouverneur Urbend Drivestem löst sich derart schnell aus der Menge, dass er aus dem Nichts zu materialisieren scheint.{/n} "Ich bedauere, dass derart unerfreuliche Umstände {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} dazu bewogen haben, die Hauptstadt zu besuchen."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! 'Tis an honour!" {n}Governor Urbend Drivestem seems to materialise out of thin air, so suddenly does he emerge from the crowd.{/n} "I regret that such unfortunate circumstances have occasioned the Rogue Trader's visit to the capital."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Welch eine Ehre!" {n}Urbend taucht so plötzlich aus der Menge auf, als hätte er die ganze Zeit über vor dir gestehen.{/n} "Ich bedauere, dass solch unglückliche Umstände der Grund für den Besuch {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} in der Hauptstadt waren."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Şeref verdiniz!" {n}Vali Urbend Drivestem, kalabalığın arasından bir anda fırlayıveriyor. {/n} "Hür Tacir'in başkent ziyaretinde böylesi talihsizliklerle karşılaşmasından pek bir eseflendik."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! 'Tis an honour!" {n}Governor Urbend Drivestem seems to materialise out of thin air, so suddenly does he emerge from the crowd.{/n} "I regret that such unfortunate circumstances have occasioned the Rogue Trader's visit to the capital."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Şeref verdiniz!" {n}Vali Urbend Drivestem, kalabalığın arasından bir anda fırlayıveriyor. {/n} "Hür Tacir'in başkent ziyaretinde böylesi talihsizliklerle karşılaşması bizim için bir utanç kaynağıdır."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor
